name: No Offense
description:
Music credits: Tedor_Zenith under CC-BY-SA

CONTROLS:

THERE IS ONLY ONE BUTTON (PLAY YOUR WAY)

Click to play with spacebar or left mouse button

Click spacebar to continue playing after death or use mouse input on the ui too. TOTALLY TOTALLY up to you 

This is my entry for One-Button Jam 2022, used the word RESISTANCE as inspiration. Incase you like lore. See below:

LORE:

You are a delivery person going through Kytrai  Space sector, delivery vans aren't allowed to hold weapons, only defenses, navigate through such a mess and try to not die as Kytrail Missiles bombard your ship.

this is a sneak peek to the universe of my next game too >.o

hope you have fun, i have no plans to update the game for now.
